text: The Onion Field is a 1979 American crime drama movie directed by Harold Becker and based on the 1973 novel of the same name by Joseph Wambaugh. It stars James Woods, John Savage, Ted Danson, Franklyn Seales, Priscilla Pointer, Ronny Cox, Christopher Lloyd, and was distributed by Embassy Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1979 crime drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Harold Becker
title: The Onion Field (movie)
